item.title: Successor to S.T.A.LK.E.R. - Areal or Suvarium
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
The graphics and CGI seemed a weird mix of 1-2 years behind to 10 years behind. The trailer didn’t seem very professionally done…hopefully not a reflection of the game itself.

Read full topic

item.title: Successor to S.T.A.LK.E.R. - Areal or Suvarium
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
I saw this but it seems kind of fishy. Also being on consoles was one of the things that caused Stalker 2 to go under and wouldn’t have done it any good so that kind of puts me off. I’ll still keep my eye on it though and hope it’s good.

Edit: Also

Areal is a mixture of FPS and TPS, with TPS coming into play during moments that are cinematic.

Doesn’t sound too good.

Read full topic
